factions.name: Keepers of the Ancient Pact
factions.description: Ancient religious order maintaining the sacred covenant between dragonkind and humanity. Based at the Temple of Eternal Flame.
factions.ideology: Protect the sacred bond between dragons and humans; maintain the ancient pact that protects the realm

factions.name: Dragon Knights
factions.description: Elite military order trained in anti-dragon combat. Ironically named before dragons were revealed as allies rather than enemies.
factions.ideology: Protect the kingdom of Ashenfell with elite martial prowess
factions.equipment: Dragonbane Swords forged from meteoric iron with protective wards
factions.casualties: 11 knights (3 wounded by Kael, 1 transformed to stone, 8 killed in Necropolis)

factions.name: Alliance of Light
factions.description: Grand coalition formed by King Aldric III to combat the Shadowblight threat. Unites the Dragon Knights, Keepers of the Ancient Pact, and Zarathax.
factions.ideology: Unite all factions of Ashenfell against the Shadow Lord Nex'thara
factions.challenges: Dwarven holds and elven kingdom refused to join

factions.name: Shadowblight
factions.description: Corrupted force serving the Shadow Lord Nex'thara. Spawns Shadowfiends and corrupts living beings.
factions.ideology: Serve the return of Shadow Lord Nex'thara; spread corruption across Ashenfell

factions.name: Thieves Guild
factions.description: Criminal organization operating in the port city of Saltmere. Led by Vex Shadowmere.

factions.name: Kingdom of Valorheim
factions.description: Human kingdom ruling Ashenfell. Based in the capital city of Valorheim.
factions.corruption_level: High - half of noble houses corrupted by shadow

factions.name: Dwarven Holds of Ironpeak
factions.description: Dwarven civilization in the Ironpeak Mountains. Refused to join the Alliance of Light.
factions.grievance: Ancient Dragon Wars destroyed their ancestral city of Karak-Thun

factions.name: Elven Kingdom of Silverwood
factions.description: Elven civilization that sealed its borders, relying on its own magical defenses.

factions.name: Nomadic Tribes of the Scorching Wastes
factions.description: Nomadic people of the Scorching Wastes who follow their own gods.

factions.name: Elder Race
factions.description: Pre-human civilization that maintained balance between material and shadow realms. Built structures covered in glowing runes from the Time Before.

factions.name: Shadow Dragons
factions.description: Dragons corrupted by Shadow Lord's power, their flames replaced by necrotic energy.

political_entities.name: Kingdom of Ashenfell
political_entities.description: The realm ruled by King Aldric III, currently threatened by Shadowblight corruption.
political_entities.advisor: Mordren the Gray (secretly serving Shadow Lord)
political_entities.corruption: Half of noble houses corrupted by shadow

political_entities.name: Court of King Aldric III
political_entities.description: The royal court of Valorheim, currently infiltrated by shadow corruption.
political_entities.status: corrupted (advisor traitor, half nobles corrupted, King showing signs of corruption)

religious_orders.name: Temple of Eternal Flame
religious_orders.description: Religious temple housing the Keepers of the Ancient Pact. Maintains the sacred covenant between dragons and humanity.

religious_orders.name: Order of the Lightbearer
religious_orders.description: Ancient order that chose a hero each generation to wield the Dawn Blade. The line was broken during the Purge of Magic three centuries ago.
religious_orders.note: Kael Ironheart may be the new Lightbearer

religious_orders.name: Purge of Magic
religious_orders.description: Historical event three centuries ago that broke the Lightbearer line and resulted in the loss of the Dawn Blade.
impact: Shattered Celestial Crown into seven pieces

religious_orders.name: Rite of Eternal Bonding
religious_orders.description: Ancient dragon ritual that binds two dragons' life forces together. Vyrnax performed this to save Zarathax, giving half her life force to sustain him.
religious_orders.effect: Binds flames and life forces of two dragons; neither fully powerful but both alive

social_structures.name: Social Mobility in Ashenfell
social_structures.description: The realm shows evidence of social mobility - Kael Ironheart rose from blacksmith's son to apprentice priestess due to magical aptitude.
examples: Kael Ironheart: blacksmith's son → apprentice at Temple of Eternal Flame (fire magic aptitude)
Vex Shadowmere: treasure hunter → leader of Thieves Guild

social_structures.name: Military Honor System
social_structures.description: Dragon Knights operate on a code of honor. Seraphina was broken by having to kill innocents, showing the weight placed on honorable conduct.

social_structures.name: Lightbearer Transformation
social_structures.description: Kael Ironheart transformed from mortal to something greater - not quite human, not quite divine - upon placing the New Crown on his head.
social_structures.subject: Kael Ironheart
social_structures.nature: Neither fully human nor divine, something greater

historical_events.name: First Sealing of Nex'thara
historical_events.description: The Elder Race, dragons, and ancestors' gods combined their power to seal the Shadow Lord Nex'thara in the Void Between Worlds.
historical_events.outcome: Nex'thara sealed in Void Between Worlds

historical_events.name: Dragon Wars
historical_events.description: Ancient conflict that destroyed the dwarven ancestral city of Karak-Thun. The dwarves of Ironpeak Mountains remain bitter about this.
historical_events.consequences: Dwarven holds refused to join Alliance of Light

historical_events.name: Destruction of Karak-Thun
historical_events.description: Dwarven ancestral city destroyed during the Dragon Wars.
historical_events.consequences: Dwarven bitterness toward dragons; refusal to join Alliance of Light

historical_events.name: Purge of Magic
historical_events.description: Event that broke the Lightbearer line and scattered the Celestial Crown into seven pieces.
impact: Celestial Crown shattered into seven fragments

historical_events.name: Awakening of Zarathax
historical_events.description: Ancient dragon Zarathax awoke from thousand-year slumber as his eternal flame weakened due to Shadowblight corruption.
historical_events.significance: Triggered the formation of the Alliance of Light

historical_events.name: Formation of the Alliance of Light
historical_events.description: King Aldric III declared the formation of the Alliance of Light to combat the Shadowblight.
historical_events.purpose: Unite fractured factions of Ashenfell against Shadow Lord Nex'thara

historical_events.name: Battle at the Obsidian Caverns
historical_events.description: First battle where Dragon Knights, Keepers, and Zarathax fought together against Mordren's Shadowfiends. Kael discovered Sunfire magic.
historical_events.discovery: Sunfire magic (fire + holy light) by Kael

historical_events.name: Quest for the Celestial Crown
historical_events.description: Three-part quest to recover the seven fragments of the Celestial Crown, find the Dawn Blade, and restore Zarathax's flame.
objectives: Recover seven fragments of Celestial Crown (Seraphina's path)
Find the Dawn Blade (Mirana and Kael's path)
historical_events.outcome: Three fragments recovered, Dawn Blade acquired, Zarathax nearly died

historical_events.name: Battle of Dragon's Graveyard
historical_events.description: Zarathax confronted his former mate Vyrnax, now a Shadow Dragon. He couldn't kill her and instead sealed her in crystallized flame at great cost to his own life.
historical_events.significance: Cost Zarathax most of his remaining flame

historical_events.name: Forging of the New Crown
historical_events.description: Desperate ritual forging a New Crown from three fragments, Zarathax's flame, temple power, knight courage, and Dawn Blade light. Kael transformed into the Lightbearer Reborn.
historical_events.outcome: New Crown formed; Kael became Lightbearer Reborn; Zarathax collapsed; Vyrnax purified

historical_events.name: Second Sealing Preparation
historical_events.description: The Alliance of Light marches north to face Mordren and the emerging Shadow Lord. Documented in the Chronicles of the Second Sealing.
